pages.title: Lighting the Wickerman
pages.text: $(#734608)The Harvester is less a monster and more a force of nature. Learned this dark ritual from a witch: building one of these scarecrows around a $(l:slayers_journal/soulfire_core)$(item)Soulfire Chassis$() $(#734608)will summon an echo of the Harvester's spirit.$()

pages.name: Harvester Effigy
pages.text: $(#734608)A lit pumpkin, bales of hay, and hardened bone form the body.$()
